Shield yourself for {1} sec, absorbing {2} damage.

Consumes all available Soul Fragments to add {3} to the shield per fragment.

Descriptions.840062827: Carve into the soul of your target, dealing {1} Fire damage and an additional {2} Fire damage over {3} sec.  Immediately shatters {4} Lesser Soul Fragments from the target and {5} additional Lesser Soul Fragment every {6} sec.

Descriptions.3539584572: Every {1} Soul Fragments you consume increases the damage of your next Soul Cleave or Spirit Bomb by {2}%.

Descriptions.3478861731:
Leech increased by {1}%.

Gain an additional {2}% leech while Metamorphosis is active.

Descriptions.1369175350: Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates {1} Lesser Soul [plural|Fragment|Fragments].

Descriptions.975667219:
Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.

Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for {1} sec.

Descriptions.3862333079: When consuming a Soul Fragment would heal you above full health it shields you instead, up to a maximum of {1}.

Descriptions.3628608101: Reduces the cooldown of Spectral Sight by {1} sec.
Descriptions.2273856092:
Allows you to see enemies and treasures through physical barriers, as well as enemies that are stealthed and invisible. Lasts {1} sec.

Loss of control effects disrupt the sight.

Descriptions.3669603338: Consume up to {1} available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies for {2} Fire damage per fragment consumed, and afflicting them with Frailty for {3} sec, causing you to heal for {4}% of damage you deal to them. Deals reduced damage beyond {5} targets.

Descriptions.2219345955: Consume Magic generates {1} Fury when a beneficial Magic effect is successfully removed from the target.

Descriptions.676142968: Vengeful Retreat has a {1} sec reduced cooldown and generates {2} Fury over {3} sec.

Descriptions.393959590:
Charge to your target, striking them for {1} Chaos damage, rooting them in place for {2} sec and inflicting {3} Chaos damage over {4} sec to up to {5} enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for {6}% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for {7} sec.

Descriptions.1541816943: Fel energy thickens your skin to demonic proportions, increasing your Stamina by {1}% and your Armor by {2}%.

Descriptions.397308150: Throw a demonic glaive at the target, dealing {1} Physical damage. The glaive can ricochet to an additional enemy within {2} yards. Generates high threat.
Descriptions.1303731041: Throw a demonic glaive at the target, dealing {1} Physical damage. The glaive can ricochet to {2} additional enemies within {3} yards.
Descriptions.1928797795: Throw a demonic glaive at the target, dealing {1} Physical damage. The glaive can ricochet to an additional enemy within {2} yards.
Descriptions.2469633465: Throw a demonic glaive at the target, dealing {1} Physical damage. The glaive can ricochet to {2} additional enemies within {3} yards. Generates high threat.

Descriptions.4177245906: Taunts the target to attack you.

Descriptions.3067495618:
You focus the assault on this target, increasing their damage taken by {1}% for {2} min. Each unique player that attacks the target increases the damage taken by an additional {3}%, stacking up to {4} times.

Your melee attacks refresh the duration of Focused Assault.

Descriptions.3157238795: The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional {1} Chaos damage over {2} sec.

Descriptions.812980580: The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase the damage of your next Fel Rush or Felblade by {1}%. Lasts {2} sec.

Descriptions.956263637: Taking damage causes you to gain Fury based on the damage dealt.

Descriptions.2551344181: Vengeful Retreat reduces the movement speed of all nearby enemies by {1}% for {2} sec.

Descriptions.3032651824: Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take {1} Physical damage.
Descriptions.3582178825: Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take {1} Physical damage and have their movement speed reduced by {2}% for {3} sec.
Descriptions.2605271775:
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take {1} Physical damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Fury over {3} sec if you damage an enemy.}
Descriptions.845554212:
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take {1} Physical damage and have their movement speed reduced by {2}% for {3} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {4} Fury over {5} sec if you damage an enemy.}

Descriptions.2540166663:
Frailty now also reduces all damage you take from afflicted targets by {1}%.

Enemies struck by Soul Cleave are afflicted with Frailty for {2} sec.

Descriptions.3602618943:
Immolation Aura generates {1}-{2} Fury when it deals critical damage.

This effect may only occur once per {3} sec.

Descriptions.1602531919: Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by {1}%.

Descriptions.4258028337: Throw Glaive deals {1}% increased damage, reduced by {2}% for each previous enemy hit.

Descriptions.1505216917: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks.

Descriptions.1545937471: You gain Parry equal to {1}% of your Critical Strike from gear.

Descriptions.47873328: Increases your chance to critically strike by {1}%.

Descriptions.1292463668: Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional {1}% of damage dealt as Chaos over {2} sec.

Descriptions.1835171188: The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat cause your next Fel Rush or Felblade to empower you, increasing damage by {1}% for {2} sec.

Descriptions.3006198047:
Immolation Aura has {1} additional [plural|charge|charges], {2}% chance to refund a charge when used, and deals Chaos damage instead of Fire.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.

Descriptions.1033969614: You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to {1}% of your maximum health.

Descriptions.316579793: For {1} sec after using Fel Rush, activating it again will dash back towards your initial location.

Descriptions.2165104385: Your Chaos damage has a {1}% chance to be increased by {2}%, occurring up to {3} total [plural|Time|times].

Descriptions.581938832:
Sigil of Flame has {1} sec reduced cooldown and {2} additional [plural|charge|charges].

You have {3}% increased chance to parry attacks from enemies afflicted by your Sigil of Flame.

Descriptions.121659717:
Sigil of Flame's initial damage is increased by {1}%.

Multiple applications of Sigil of Flame may overlap.

Descriptions.3604968759:
When you parry an attack or have one of your attacks parried, restore {1}% of max health and {2} Fury. 

This effect may only occur once every {3} sec.

Descriptions.4115837146: Throw Glaive has {1} charges and {2} yard increased range.

Descriptions.1073773706: After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by {1}% for {2} sec and your damage and healing by {3}% for {4} sec.

Descriptions.43038253: Immolation Aura has {1} yd increased radius and {2}% increased critical strike damage bonus.

Descriptions.2911246072:
{1}% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over {2} sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by {3}%.

Descriptions.283662398:
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Chaos Strike to deal {1} additional Physical damage.

Felblade consumes up to {2} nearby Soul Fragments.
Descriptions.1859499208: Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Shear to deal {1} additional Physical damage.
Descriptions.2536222743: Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Fracture to deal {1} additional Physical damage.

Descriptions.2133854530: Your Spectral Sight is tinted by the void and you see enemies shrouded in Shadow.

Descriptions.385710602: Throw Glaive deals {1} Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.

Descriptions.3829032224: Your Immolate crackles with less fel energy appearing almost like normal fire!

Descriptions.469345726:
Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Fel Devastation, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by {1}% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.
Descriptions.2593918378:
Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Eye Beam, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by {1}% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.

Descriptions.1303987477: Felblade surrounds you with a Blade Ward, reducing damage taken by {1}% for {2} sec.

Descriptions.2471388594: Sigil of Flame applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by {1}% and granting {2} Fury every {3} sec, for {4} sec.

Descriptions.3703277822: Magical damage increased by {1}%, and Physical damage taken reduced by {2}%.

Descriptions.392891886:
Consuming {1} Soul Fragments or casting The Hunt converts your next Throw Glaive into Reaver's Glaive.

|T5927616:24|t {ffffffff|Reaver's Glaive}: 
Throw a glaive enhanced with the essence of consumed souls at your target, dealing {2} Physical damage and ricocheting to {3} additional [plural|enemy|enemies].
 
Begins a well-practiced pattern of glaivework, enhancing your next Shear and Soul Cleave.

The enhanced ability you cast first deals {4}% increased damage, and the second deals {5}% increased damage.

{FFffffff|Generates {6} Fury.}

Descriptions.1357154101: Your blades burn with Fel energy, causing your Soul Cleave, Throw Glaive, and auto-attacks to deal an additional {1}% damage as Fire over {2} sec.
Descriptions.1196851216: Your blades burn with Fel energy, causing your Chaos Strike, Throw Glaive, and auto-attacks to deal an additional {1}% damage as Fire over {2} sec.

Descriptions.1180548669: Chaos Nova slows enemies by {1}% and reduces attack and cast speed {2}% for {3} sec after its stun fades.

Descriptions.2339891863: Your Spectral Sight is altered by Fel energy causing you to see all enemies in a Fel light.

Descriptions.3405924049: Sigil of Spite now resembles the Kyrian Covenant Ability: Elysian Decree.

2850015906.Name: Glyph of Fodder to the Flame

Descriptions.1340406981: Fodder to the Flame now resembles the Necrolord Covenant Ability.

Descriptions.945154859:
Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after {1} sec.

Detonates to deal {2} Chaos damage and shatter up to {3} Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.

Descriptions.281779985: Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional {1}% of the amount healed.

Descriptions.2092441346: You now have green wings when Glide is active.

Descriptions.3857234018: Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

Descriptions.3765345192: Your Shattered Souls are tainted with mana.

Descriptions.2681116231:
Metamorphosis now also causes Demon's Bite to generate {1} additional Fury.

While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing {2} Fire damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
Descriptions.4086455546:
Metamorphosis now also causes Demon Blades to generate {1} additional Fury.

While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing {2} Fire damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
Descriptions.2590423258:
Metamorphosis now also greatly empowers Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb.

While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing {1} Fire damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.

Descriptions.2384302925: The Hunt now resembles the Night Fae Covenant Ability.

Descriptions.2306566651:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts {1} additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Shear, cast {2} slashes instead.
Descriptions.3501701834:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Blade Dance casts {1} additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Chaos Strike, cast {2} slashes instead.
Descriptions.693806390:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts {1} additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Fracture, cast {2} slashes instead.

Descriptions.2849811401:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Shear applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take {1}% increased damage for {2} sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to {3}%.
Descriptions.425088553:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Chaos Strike applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take {1}% increased damage for {2} sec. 

If cast after Blade Dance, Reaver's Mark is increased to {3}%.
Descriptions.2510727265:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Fracture applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take {1}% increased damage for {2} sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to {3}%.

Descriptions.231384212: You now have yellow wings when Glide is active.

Descriptions.2546481279: Increases Versatility by {1}% and reduces threat generated by {2}%.

Descriptions.2787094774: Vengeful Retreat can be cast a second time within {1} sec.

Descriptions.3150417420: Your Shattered Souls are tainted with Fel.

Descriptions.3592392825: The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing maximum health by {1}% and Armor by {2}%.
Descriptions.500013954: The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing Chaos Strike and Blade Dance damage by {1}%, and Haste by {2}%.

Descriptions.2686613668: When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Fel Devastation are immediately reset.
Descriptions.4160114423: When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Immolation Aura are immediately reset.

Descriptions.1920812700: The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.

Descriptions.3656458275:
Demonsurge deals {1}% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by {2}%.

Descriptions.1762604576: Expose weaknesses in the target of your {ffffffff|Reaver's Mark}, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal {1}% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.

Descriptions.1044684128: Agility increased by {1}% while not in demon form.

Descriptions.3930227670: You now have tattered wings when Glide is active.

Descriptions.832613043: Your Throw Glaive now launches your main hand weapon.

Descriptions.189324185: Leech granted by Soul Rending increased by {1}% and an additional {2}% while Metamorphosis is active.

Descriptions.1389418597: Unleashing Meatamorphosis sends nearby critters fleeing in panic.

Descriptions.837811567: Movement speed increased by {1}% per {2} Fury.

Descriptions.4193716643: The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase your damage by {1}% for {2} sec.
